mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, card_key, card_title, card_path, card_category, click_count, last_click_time, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, remark
mapper.select: SELECT FROM aitech_card_click WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY click_count DESC, IFNULL(last_click_time, create_time) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE aitech_card_click SET click_count = click_count + 1, card_title = #{cardTitle}, card_path = #{cardPath}, card_category = #{cardCategory}, last_click_time = #{lastClickTime} WHERE id = #{id}
